note: Hi, folks . Nice to meet you in this corner of the cosmos. Well, I love real Democracy, the very genuine concept of freedom, not only the way a person is free in where to go or what to do, but to protect its human rights of privacy-safety in internet. I don't want hate, Nazi or white supremacy. If you don't like my vision please go away
